keywords.DESCRIPTION: Prevents HP lost. Increase #b1 Attack damage per #b3 Concentrations.
Insert the chosen card into the leftmost position of all #ytargets. If the number of #yTargets viewed has reached the limit, add the rightmost #yTarget into your hand.
Top cards viewed by Hina in your draw pile. You can change the top card of the draw pile by manipulating the #ytarget.
When attacked, gain the corresponding layer of #yBlocks.
Cards without cost are considered as cost #b-2. Cards cost X are considered as cost #b-1.
The mystic of Hina, can be used to Stabilize cards. NL Won't join the battle, but will enter among the #ydestroyer .
